name: Cargo Chase
description:
Dodge asteroids, enemy ships and your own cargo in this action packed shooter.

Made for Ready Set Jam.

Game theme: Reinterpreting classic Asteroids with the added twist of Can’t Stop Moving.

Controls.

Move ship with Arrow keys or WASD

Shift key to shoot

Ctrl key to drift (hold drift with accelerating and turning for tighter maneuvering)
